DOC.detailed_description: Subjects undergoing abdominal hysterectomy surgery randomize one four group : Intravenous Lidocaine , Intravenous Ketamine , Intravenous Lidocaine Ketamine Placebo . Subjects perform six-minute walk test prior surgery second day postoperatively . After surgery day 1 2 surgery , subject rate pain . On day 1 postoperatively , subject rate fatigue . On postoperative day 1 2 incisional pain analyse use von Frey filament . Two hour surgery , 10 ml venous blood sample cytokine analysis . Telephone follow take place 6 12 month postoperatively access pain quality life .
